name: Let's Stack!
description:
LET'S STACK is here! Help the little duck build the tallest tower (of blocks) ever (at least, in the leaderboard)!

This addictive fun-finger touch (and time) game is fun for the entire family! Compete against other players in a worldwide leaderboard and see who has the tallest tower (of blocks)!

This game was made by Yuma Soerianto, a 10 year old iOS developer.
